subject: Football
Deaths (Fatalities)
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ryan Brenner, 16, lost his older brother Casey and three other teammates from Mainland High School’s football team to an auto accident in August; since then, football has been his solace.
snippet: Ryan Brenner, 16, lost his older brother Casey and three other teammates from Mainland High School’s football team to an auto accident in August; since then, football has been his solace.
